DOC.brief_summary: Study Objectives : 1 . Determine correlation quantitative muscle ultrasound ( QMUS ) , electrical impedance myography ( EIM ) currently accept measure physical function . 2 . Determine reliability EIM measure perform home use hand hold device . 3 . Determine QMUS EIM detect pre-clinical change Pompe disease .
DOC.criteria: Genetically confirm diagnosis Pompe disease . Age < 18 year Inability provide inform consent .
